UniprotID	Q96A72

EntryName	MGN2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein mago nashi homolog 2
GeneName	MAGOHB MAGOH2
Length	148
Function	Required for pre-mRNA splicing as component of the spliceosome (PubMed:28502770, PubMed:29301961, PubMed:30705154). Plays a redundant role with MAGOH in the exon junction complex and in the nonsense-mediated decay (NMD) pathway (PubMed:23917022).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
